•vember 19, 1952
EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR
UNIVERSITY OF ILLINOIS
119 GREGORY HALL
URBANA, ILLINOIS
Mr, John Dunn \V 1
Station WKA.D “
University of Oklahoma
Norman, Oklahoma
Dear Johns
Thanks for your good letter of November 15. However, if I may, I»ll
disagree with you again. X feel that we should proceed to process member¬
ship applications on a regular basis. If Graydon is not quite ready to
appoint his committees, may I suggest to him that he informally appoint
you on an interim basis until all committees are formally announced?
Until he takes such action, I will continue to send the applications to
you for your possible use.
In that regard, I am enclosing with this letter two more applications.
Mth MilSs—'
Executive Director
JSMsll
ocs Graydon Ausmus
